code:
def test_function(x, y):
  """
  This function takes two parameters and returns the sum of the two.
  """
  return x + y

def test_function_test():
  """
  This is a unit test for the test_function() function.
  """
  assert test_function(1, 2) == 3
  assert test_function(2, 3) == 5
  assert test_function(5, 5) == 10
  print("All unit tests passed!")

test_function_test()
